mainEntity.name: What is the Black Screen tool?

acceptedAnswer.text: The Black Screen tool turns your screen completely black. It's perfect for testing monitors, using as a dark background, or focusing without distractions.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it as a light-off screen or night mode?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Many people use the black screen to reduce glare or light while watching movies, resting, or sleeping.

mainEntity.name: Does the black screen damage the display?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, it's completely safe. It simply displays a black color and doesn't affect your monitor or pixels.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it in full screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Click the Full Screen button or press F11 for a borderless black display.

mainEntity.name: Is it available offline?

acceptedAnswer.text: Once loaded, you can keep the black screen active even without an internet connection.

mainEntity.name: What is the White Screen tool used for?

acceptedAnswer.text: It displays a pure white background, commonly used for lighting, brightness tests, or cleaning stuck pixels.

mainEntity.name: Can it be used as a light source?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Many users use the white screen to brighten dark rooms or as a makeshift soft light for photography or Zoom meetings.

mainEntity.name: Will it harm my eyes or monitor?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, but avoid staring at bright white light for long periods. It's safe for monitors.

mainEntity.name: Can I adjust brightness?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Use your device's brightness control to reduce or increase light intensity.

mainEntity.name: What is the Blue Screen tool?

acceptedAnswer.text: It shows a solid blue background on your monitor — ideal for blue color testing, visual balance, or chroma-style effects.

mainEntity.name: Is it the same as the Blue Screen of Death?

acceptedAnswer.text: No. This is a harmless blue background generator, not an error screen.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it for photography or video?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the solid blue color works well as a background for compositing or creative effects.

mainEntity.name: Does it support full screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: Absolutely. Use the full-screen button for an immersive display.

mainEntity.name: What is the Red Screen tool for?

acceptedAnswer.text: It fills your display with red — often used for testing stuck or dead pixels on monitors and screens.

mainEntity.name: Is red light good for eyes?

acceptedAnswer.text: Red light is softer at night and may help reduce strain compared to blue light.

mainEntity.name: Can I use this for lighting or ambience?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. The red screen can create a warm, cozy light effect in dark rooms.

mainEntity.name: Does it work on mobile?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. The Red Screen tool works perfectly on phones and tablets.

mainEntity.name: What does the Green Screen page do?

acceptedAnswer.text: It shows a flat green background, useful for video compositing, color calibration, or visual tests.

mainEntity.name: Is this suitable for chroma key effects?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. You can use the green screen as a simple background for video editing and streaming.

mainEntity.name: Does it have ads or watermarks?

acceptedAnswer.text: No, the screen is clean and distraction-free — ideal for production use.

mainEntity.name: Can I make it full screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. Click the full-screen button or press F11 for a clean green display.

mainEntity.name: What is the purpose of the Purple (or Pink) Screen?

acceptedAnswer.text: It displays a soft purple or pink color, used for calming visuals, background light, or aesthetic effects.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it for lighting or mood setting?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, many users use the purple or pink screen to create ambient lighting for rooms or photography.

mainEntity.name: Does it work on phones and tablets?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. It's mobile-friendly and adjusts automatically to your screen size.

mainEntity.name: Is it safe for long use?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, but like all bright screens, take occasional breaks to rest your eyes.

mainEntity.name: What is the Orange or Yellow Screen used for?

acceptedAnswer.text: It shows a warm color background for testing, design previews, or mood lighting.

mainEntity.name: Can it reduce blue light at night?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, orange and yellow tones are gentler on the eyes and can reduce sleep disruption.

mainEntity.name: Can I use it as a light source?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes, the warm hue can be used as a reading light or ambient glow.

mainEntity.name: Does it work on all devices?

acceptedAnswer.text: Yes. It runs smoothly on desktop, tablet, and mobile browsers.
